citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
During the inspection an infected left ear was found on an adult male standard poodle named Copper (#7). The facility
had noticed he was shaking his head but had not identified the infection. The inside of the ear was red and had copious
amounts of greasy brown exudate in the ear canal and covering about 50 percent of the underside of the pinna. Failure to
perform adequate daily observations can lead to missed medical conditions that can progress without treatment. The
facility must conduct daily observation of all the animals to assess their health and provide needed veterinary care.
Correction date July 26, 2023 by providing adequate daily observation and treatment to all animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Sheydanis DiazMartinez, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(b)(3) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
During the inspection an infected left ear was found on an adult male standard poodle named Copper (#7). The facility 
had noticed he was shaking his head but had not identified the infection. The inside of the ear was red and had copious 
amounts of greasy brown exudate in the ear canal and covering about 50 percent of the underside of the pinna. Failure to 
perform adequate daily observations can lead to missed medical conditions that can progress without treatment. The 
facility must conduct daily observation of all the animals to assess their health and provide needed veterinary care.  
Correction date July 26, 2023 by providing adequate daily observation and treatment to all animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
COURTNEY JERNIGAN, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Sheydanis DiazMartinez, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
